name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 5, Hegang, Heilongjiang. The man said he became disabled in an accident in 2008 and could only move his head. In 2012, he applied for government assistance because he had spent all his savings. The government cancelled the assistance in 2023, and the minimum living allowance in January 2024. At the end of last year, the government asked him to return 96,000 yuan in assistance over the years. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887210788722786304/pu/img/6aP48GaiNhTVm1Cx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Ma Yan, a 32-year-old Hui Christian pastor, will be tried on February 10 for "organizing an illegal gathering."
On August 9, 2024, the police raided a small gathering of Ma Yan and 10 other Christians at a guesthouse in Jinfeng District, Yinchuan City, Ningxia, and detained Ma Yan and three others. The other three were released within 10 days, but after Ma Yan was detained for 10 days, he was immediately detained again on suspicion of "organizing an illegal gathering" until today. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjEisXrXIAE7gsK.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 5, Dezhou, Shandong. The urban management asked a coffee shop owner to tear down the couplet posted outside the door on the grounds that it affected the city appearance. The urban management said that the wall belongs to the country, and you only have the right to use the shop, it is not your property. The owner retorted: Why don’t you say that the government propaganda slogans fixed on the wall affect the city appearance? 
The original video has been deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887393095345709056/pu/img/WZIt9bGbtWQ_VhTz.jpg

The official Weibo account of the Chinese Red Hacker Alliance issued a statement: So far, the alliance has not received any requests for help from DeepSeek, nor has it had any form of cooperation with it. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjGDHRmbIAA3O-t.jpg

We will find and deal with people and things that destroy the business environment, and we will never be lenient or lenient! The video shows that Ukrainian soldiers saw their long-lost comrades among the prisoners exchanged, and the two hugged each other tightly. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887444122979704832/pu/img/F5hUmCOTa6OzaKXz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 30, a blogger from Northeast China said that he went to a TV station for an internship and went to many places to apply for an access card and a meal card but failed. In the end, his mother dug deep to find connections. After talking to a leader of the TV station on the phone, the next day the superior showed his courtesy as soon as he saw him, and handed over the meal card and access card with both hands.
The man said that in the Northeast, people don’t understand human relationships, and it’s difficult to do anything. Everyone will use the little power in their hands to make things difficult for others. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887446584612560897/pu/img/PS6MixgEaD1VHbBM.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 58-year-old Yang Xiuwei has been engaged in voluntary blood donation since 2005. He has donated blood hundreds of times in 20 years and is known as the "blood donation king" in Sichuan. On January 30, Yang Xiuwei suffered a sudden cerebral infarction and was hospitalized. He is still in critical condition. His wife said that the high cost of treatment has stretched them to the limit. Now they still owe the hospital 10,000 yuan and plan to launch a crowdfunding to raise medical expenses. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjGa2cMbIAImmIs.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The European Union will strengthen inspections on goods sold on websites such as Shein and Temu, and may gradually cancel tariff exemptions for packages below 150 euros. This will undoubtedly have an impact on large online retailers such as Temu and Shein.
The European Commission said that cheap, unsafe imported goods constitute unfair competition for EU sellers that comply with regulations, and the transportation of a large number of packages has a negative impact on the environment and climate.
According to EU data, about 4.6 billion packages worth no more than 150 euros entered the EU market last year, of which more than 90% of low-value goods came from China.
The European Commission said: "This figure is twice that of 2023 and three times that of 2022. Many goods have been found not to comply with relevant European legal regulations."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Bozhou Politics and Law: Recently, four migrant workers in Bozhou City climbed onto the roof of a factory building to demand their wages. The police persuaded the migrant workers to come down and took them to the police station for education. Currently, Liu and four others have been administratively detained for disrupting the order of the unit. The police remind: Jumping off a building to demand wages is not allowed. Don't let rights protection become illegal. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjGh_c2boAAiT0y.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Financial Times quoted people familiar with the matter on Tuesday as saying that China's State Administration for Market Regulation is considering launching an investigation into Intel. The specific nature of the investigation is unclear, and whether it will be formally launched may be affected by the state of Sino-US relations. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjGnKOnbIAQi3bh.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 7, 2025 is the fifth anniversary of Dr. Li Wenliang's death in official records.
For us, this one-day-late obituary means a lot.
It means "eight rumormongers were investigated and punished", it means "unknown pneumonia is preventable and controllable, and no signs of human-to-human transmission have been found", it means that Wuhan, a city of 13 million people, has become an isolated island like a zombie city overnight.
It also means a silent New Year, the closed doors of the nine provinces, and the panic and fear of 1.4 billion Chinese people. It also means that the body of the new crown whistleblower, who has lost all vital signs but is still suffering from cruel performance-style rescues such as intubation and electric shock, has finally been squeezed out of the last bit of public opinion value and can be buried.
However, for Dr. Li Wenliang, all these meanings are meaningless. He slept in the silent winter of 34 years old.
But he also lives here forever. Five years, Dr. Li...
fullContent:
2025年2月7日，是官方记录中，李文亮医生的五周年忌日。
对于我们而言，这个迟来一天的讣告意味着很多。
它意味着“八名造谣者被查处”，它意味着“不明原因肺炎可防、可控，未发现人传人迹象”，它意味着武汉，这个拥有1300万人的城市，在一夜之间变成了犹如丧尸城一般的孤岛。
它还意味着寂静的新年，九州一起封闭的大门，14亿国人的恐慌与惊惧。它更意味这位新冠吹哨人的遗体，在已经失去所有生命体征，却仍在遭受一次次插管、一遍遍电击的残酷的表演式抢救后，终于被榨干了最后一点舆论价值，得以入土为安。
然而，对于李文亮医生，这些意味却全都没有了意义。他长眠于34岁那个寂静的冬天。
但他也永生于斯。五年，李医生的微博成为了中国的哭墙，岁月未能抹去那夜的悲怆。
李医生，以及所有在疫情中逝去的人们，祝你们在天堂安好！

content: On February 6, someone posted a photo of an apple that looked red on the outside but was rotten on the inside, implying that China today looks bright and beautiful on the outside, but is actually corrupt on the inside, sparking heated discussions among netizens: "It's only been 76 days, how come there are so many worms and it rots so quickly?" "This apple must be 5,000 years old." "Before you cut it open, you think it's fine, but when the rotten part floats on the water, it starts to hide." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjGzIb4aUAApznj.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Farmers' Daily once published an article: Rural residents' income has achieved leapfrog growth, and the pockets of hundreds of millions of farmers are getting fatter.
A farmer from Hebei accused the report of being untrue: Whether the farmers' pockets are fatter or not is not something you can blow up with just one sentence. More than 20 years have passed, and the price of corn has only increased by one or two cents. "A pound of corn can't even buy a bottle of mineral water. What kind of world is this?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1887494319944441858/pu/img/KMkTjERla1DM7Aqp.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The United States imposed a 10% tariff on Chinese goods and said the decision applies to Hong Kong. The Hong Kong government expressed strong dissatisfaction with this, believing that the US move undermines Hong Kong's status as an independent customs area and intends to file a complaint with the World Trade Organization.
A Hong Kong government spokesman said on Wednesday: As a founding member of the WTO, the Hong Kong government has always adhered to the principles of free and unimpeded trade and strongly opposes any attempt to undermine Hong Kong's reputation and status as a separate customs area https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjG8OvKaAAAu_KQ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lu Shaye, the former Chinese ambassador to France, known as the "Wolf Warrior", has been promoted to the position of special representative of the Chinese government for European affairs.
Lu Shaye served in Paris from 2019 to early January 2025 and has long been considered one of the offensive and sometimes disrespectful figures in Chinese diplomacy, known as the "Wolf Warrior". https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjHB58_aoAAaQwR.jpg

content: February 6 (Released) Heilongjiang. On March 19, 2023, the woman, Lao Yunxue, was subjected to domestic violence by her newlywed husband, Xie Wenliang. Xie Wenliang knocked her unconscious with a frying pan and strangled her neck with pajamas, causing her to become blind and unable to take care of herself. The court sentenced Xie Wenliang to 11 years in prison in the first instance. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjHPtyLbIAQCxss.jpg
